Posts.Content: Sep 3, 2009 09:36PM flowerpetal wrote: Thanks for the information on LE.   especially ro LindaLou53 and Binney for some very informative links!! for those of you (in US) who would like to contact Senators or Representatives or state legislature, here are some links to e-mail and postal addresses, and phone numbers for key elected officials. http://www.senate.gov/reference/common/faq/How_to_contact_senators.htm http://www.usa.gov/Contact/Elected.shtml I liked the idea of trying to get another article in NYTimes.  This is another angle, but what do you think of Dana Jennings - he writes some powerful stuff (http://well.blogs.nytimes.com/2008/11/25/10-things-i-learned-from-prostate-cancer/?em)
Posts.Title: Lymphedema discussions during BC awareness month kap24 Binney4
